text: [Music]
my mother was very young she was

when 30 years
ago when people didn't know the
difference between paranoid
schizophrenia or manic depression they
didn't know how to treat it so she was
kind of self-medicating with

happen because it keeps going back to
relationships and bonding she wasn't
really able to show up as a mother and
as I understand it your neurochemistry
doesn't develop a certain way as an

jolts so you're kind of being prepared

was also for me the original love junkie
if you've looked at the book there's

so I'd be reading fairy tales which no

yearning to have the original attachment
then lay on top of that the father again
they're both young it's not about

is it's not anyone's you know respons
responsibility except your own you're an

you're not going to get the parental

has its own
uh drama in the house and there was

I'm glad my mother had enough presence

of the dezie and just these
